19.ara-name: كتاب الأضاحى عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Ali:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prohibited that an animal with a A'dab (stump) horn or ear should be slaughtered as a sacrifice." Qatadah (one of the narrators) said: "So I mentioned this to Sa'eed bin Al-Musayyab and he said: 'The A'dab is that which equals or more than that

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الضَّحِيَّةِ بِعَضْبَاءِ الْقَرْنِ وَالأُذُنِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Sacrificial Animal With A Stump Horn Or Ear
